alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Southern Mountains; Southwest Utah; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 2:42PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Millard...western Sevier and northeastern Beaver Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 240 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 16 miles west of Cove Fort, or 20 miles north of Milford, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated and surface observation confirmed. At 220 PM MDT, the Milford Airport recorded a wind gust to 59 mph. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Blowing dust may reduce visibility. Locations impacted include... Milford, Cove Fort and Black Rock. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 128 and 147. Interstate 70 between mile markers 0 and 7. Utah Route 21 between mile markers 66 and 87. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
